creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: small chest with gilded copper hinges and corner fittings; design of dandelions and wisteria in shell and lead inlay and raised sprinkled design; three dragonflies on inside of the door; three removable shelves with floral pull; two keys
medium: Lacquer, sprinkled gold, lead and mother of pearl inlay, gilded copper fittings
title: Portable chest with design of wisteria
